resource.info: SELECT '-' || id || '${ENCLOSE_VALUE_SQL}' || DATABASE() || '${ENCLOSE_VALUE_SQL}' || user() || '${TRAIL_SQL}' r from sysinfo.VERSION

schema.database: select rr || '${TRAIL_SQL}' r from ( select '${ENCLOSE_VALUE_SQL}' || trim(t.schemaname) || '${SEPARATOR_QTE_SQL}0${ENCLOSE_VALUE_SQL}' rr from (select distinct schemaname from SCHEMAS) t, (select distinct schemaname from SCHEMAS) t1 where t.schemaname >= t1.schemaname group by t.schemaname {limit} ) a
schema.table: select rr || '${TRAIL_SQL}' r from ( select '${ENCLOSE_VALUE_SQL}' || trim(t.tablename) || '${SEPARATOR_QTE_SQL}0${ENCLOSE_VALUE_SQL}' rr from (select distinct tablename from TABLES where SCHEMANAME = '${DATABASE}') t, (select distinct tablename from TABLES where SCHEMANAME = '${DATABASE}') t1 where t.tablename >= t1.tablename group by t.tablename {limit} ) a
schema.column: select rr || '${TRAIL_SQL}' r from ( select '${ENCLOSE_VALUE_SQL}' || trim(t.COLUMNNAME) || '${SEPARATOR_QTE_SQL}0${ENCLOSE_VALUE_SQL}'rr from (select distinct COLUMNNAME from COLUMNS where SCHEMANAME = '${DATABASE}'and TABLENAME = '${TABLE}') t, (select distinct COLUMNNAME from COLUMNS where SCHEMANAME = '${DATABASE}'and TABLENAME = '${TABLE}') t1 where t.COLUMNNAME >= t1.COLUMNNAME group by t.COLUMNNAME {limit} ) a

row.query: select rr || '${TRAIL_SQL}' r from ( select '${ENCLOSE_VALUE_SQL}' || trim(t.s) || '${SEPARATOR_QTE_SQL}0${ENCLOSE_VALUE_SQL}' rr from (select distinct ${FIELDS} s from ${DATABASE}.${TABLE}) t, (select distinct ${FIELDS} s from ${DATABASE}.${TABLE}) t1 where t.s >= t1.s group by t.s {limit} ) a
